```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

rm(list=ls())
setwd("~/ikanx101.github.io/_posts/matematika ITB/brand map")

rm(list=ls())

library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

df = mtcars |> mutate(merek = row.names(mtcars)) |> 
     select(merek,mpg,disp,hp,wt,qsec) |>
     separate(merek,
              into = c("merek","dummy"),
              sep  = " ") |>
     group_by(merek) |>
     summarise_all(mean) |>
     ungroup() |>
     select(-dummy) |>
     as.data.frame()

```


```{r}
row.names(df) = df$merek
df$merek      = NULL
df
```
